channel.title: C4D group project, new beginers and prows ^_^
channel.description:
ok so im learning c4d and i love makeing small object for like shelfs and exhibitions, soooooo....
if i make a load of bojects and stuff dose sum 1 want to add them to like a room or a backdrop and we make a small project out of it help new beginners like me ^_^ this is fun.
i did make a museum but my program crashed O.o and lost it all lol, and im not good at building furniture yet
few examples of what iv been learning to do today ^_^

item.title: C4D group project, new beginers and prows ^_^
item.dc:creator: @welshy welshy
item.description:
@welshy wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:3, topic:129368”][quote author=welshy link=topic=179983.msg1645824#msg1645824 date=1186036850]
wow dude you’ve excelled alot! great job! im gonna try and make a fight scene or something with animation as a long term project
[/quote]

It’s easier to make radially symmetrical, glossy objects than humans.

Btw, soalreaver, this is your 6th C4D post in this section. Do you mind not spamming the Graphics help section?[/quote] hence the “long term”

Read full topic

wow dude you’ve excelled alot! great job! im gonna try and make a fight scene or something with animation as a long term project
